definitions.definition: Payment for the temporary use of something.
definitions.example: The sign offered pedalos on hire.

definitions.definition: The state of being hired, or having a job; employment.
definitions.example: When my grandfather retired, he had over twenty mechanics in his hire.

definitions.definition: A person who has been hired, especially in a cohort.
definitions.example: We pair up each of our new hires with one of our original hires.

definitions.definition: To obtain the services of in return for fixed payment.
definitions.example: We hired a car for two weeks because ours had broken down.

definitions.definition: To employ; to obtain the services of (a person) in exchange for remuneration; to give someone a job.
definitions.example: The company had problems when it tried to hire more skilled workers.

definitions.definition: To exchange the services of for remuneration.
